text: Samrat Sarkar () is an Indian playback singer, who has sung for jingles, ad films and Bollywood films. he has sung in Marathi, Bhojpuri, Punjabi and Bengali for films. he has performed in nepal, bangladesh, singapore, besides various cities of India. == References == == External links == * http://samratonline.com/ Category:1987 births Category:Living people
title: Samrat Sarkar
